Package com.google.tts

Interface Summary
TextToSpeechBeta.OnInitListener Interface definition of a callback to be invoked indicating the completion of the TextToSpeech engine initialization.
TextToSpeechBeta.OnUtteranceCompletedListener Interface definition of a callback to be invoked indicating the TextToSpeech engine has completed synthesizing an utterance with an utterance ID set.
TTS.InitListener Called when the TTS has initialized The InitListener must implement the onInit function.
TTS.SpeechCompletedListener Called when the TTS has finished speaking by itself (ie, speaking finished without being canceled).
 

Class Summary
TextToSpeechBeta Synthesizes speech from text for immediate playback or to create a sound file.
TTS Deprecated. - Use TextToSpeechBeta instead
TTSVersionAlert Creates an alert message that gives the user the option to install the missing TTS that is needed through the Android Market.
 

Enum Summary
TTSEarcon Enumerates the possible earcons to pass to the TTS.
TTSEngine Enumerates the possible TTS engines to pass to the TTS.
TTSParams Enumerates the possible parameters to pass to the TTS.
